name: A W A K E N I N G

metadata.name: H O R I Z O N S / /
metadata.description:
Across many lifetimes, many moments of existence, you find yourself at this crossroads again and again. 

The mundane nature of its cyclic routine should’ve been enough to be negligible, but instead you find yourself fascinated, even enraptured.

This time, it feels different. This time, it is special.

This is the horizon…

A vista of an enthralling dawn.
